long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to be able to see your emails quickly, without having to actually open them?

Now, instead of just reading the subject headline of your emails, Gmail Message Preview lets you preview your emails in 4 different ways. You can preview your inbox emails without actually opening them with the following choice of views: 

✔️ 1st line of your email
✔️ First 2 lines of your email
✔️ First 3 lines of your email
✔️ Entirety of your email 

This lets you quickly scan your emails without ever even clicking on them. 

And Gmail Message Preview by cloudHQ will never trigger "tracking pixels" - we will block *ALL* tracking attempt during previewing an email.

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net/
App website: https://www.gmail-message-preview.com/
Pricing: https://www.gmail-message-preview.com/pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail-message-preview/
